comment: Students at KSU will greatly miss Dr Barney and BYU students will get a great professor, when he moves, in the Fall. Very accessible, works hard to answer questions in 2-3 ways, so ensure that the student understands the answer. His goofy jokes break up what could be a monotonous lecture.
Great professor. Very passionate about what he teaches.

Dr. Barney loves what he does. Pretty boring class, but he teaches it well. Midterm, final, major project and lots of homework/quizzes. Content is super simple + all ppts are loaded onto d2L. Lectures are sometimes dry and seem to go on forever. Will often try to make jokes and lighten the mood a bit. Usually goes over quizzes before submitting.

Dr. Barney is the BOMB. If you are required to take biostat HELP YOURSELF BY TAKING HIM. I had to retake the class after taking Ferguson (stay away fromher, can't stress that enough) and he clarified everything about stats that I was not able to teach myself previously. He is SUPER NICE and really gets the whole class interested. Take him.

You just need the textbook to do homework, which he does not assign often. His powerpoint, things he writes on the board, and practice is all you need to pass this class. If you have a question, ask it. He will not shut you down. He has quizzes occasionally, and most of the time they are one question: "where you here today?" Excellent teacher!!

Dr. Barney is not helpful. He makes the class harder than the material is. His lectures are dull and boring. He seems like a nice guy but if you have not already taken a statistics course I would avoid him.

He is okay not extraordinary. Makes the class more difficult than it needs to be. A lot of busy work and pop quizzes. Not an easy class. He is not clear during lecture and expects everyone to understand. Would NOT recommend.

I loved Dr. Barney. He tries very hard to help, and is very patient with students. Some people are going to struggle; this is not an easy subject. I struggled myself, but through nobody's fault but my own. He is more than willing to help during class or office hours and really seems to go out of his way to help. And boy, is he HOT! Funny, too!

I had Dr. Barney this semester which ended up being the worst semester of my life. He tries to be helpful but even that doesn't work. His test are extremely hard and the final project he grades on specifics and detail. I had a study group with this class and we were all lost like blind mice. I dont recommend him and you will fall asleep in class...
This class is alot of work. Professor Barney tries his hardest to help but he isn't always well understood. I made an A out of that class and I have him to thank. Just be ready to work really hard.
